# NSSQLiteErrorDomain

**Global Variable**

Domain for SQLite errors.

## Declaration

```swift
let NSSQLiteErrorDomain: String
```

## Discussion

The value of “code” corresponds to preexisting values in SQLite.

## Errors

- **Validation Error Codes**: Error codes relating to the validation of managed objects.

items.description: Error codes relating to the validation of managed objects.
